about_the_game:
Expand your collection of scale model kits with this new DLC pack!

Model Builder: Into the Stars DLC contains three new space-themed models. Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!

NEW MODELS


Continue your epic journey in the scale modeling world! Inside this DLC pack, you will find three new scale model kits:

James Webb Telescope
Supernova Chaser
Texan Vulture Rocket with a launch pad

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]

short_description: Expand your collection of scale model kits with this new DLC pack! Model Builder: Into the Stars DLC contains three new space-themed models. Every new model is linked to a new quest and new Steam Achievement! Get them all!
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, German, Italian, French, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
